diff_analysis.evidence: The NEW code removes MIME type validation for uploaded assets and relies only on file extensions. Specifically, the allowed_mimetypes parameter and related checks are deleted from config.php, Asset::validate(), AssetType::validateExtension(), and UploadSubscriber::onUploadValidation(). This weakens upload validation and can allow files with dangerous content to be uploaded under an allowed extension, increasing the risk of unrestricted upload of files with dangerous types (CWE-434).
